DOC.brief_summary: The whiten action investigative hydrogen peroxide/sodium fluoride contain mouth rinse evaluate stain removal use mean Lobene Stain Index 14 day compare currently market hydrogen peroxide contain whiten mouth rinse ( Crest® 3D White Multi-Care Whitening Rinse , Glamorous White , Fresh Mint ) . A currently market toothpaste ( Colgate® Cavity Protection ) include negative control order compare brush alone . 225 healthy volunteer enrol two week study . Volunteers qualify study equal chance assign one three treatment group . Volunteers total 5 clinic visit include 1 ) screening , 2 ) baseline 3 ) Day 4 ( 3 day use ) , Day 8 ( 7 day use ) Day 15 ( 14 day use ) . Volunteers maintain diary home record treatment use . Examinations oral hard/soft tissue assessment extrinsic tooth stain subject brush water floss complete Baseline repeat Clinic Visits 3 , 4 , 5 , Days 4 , 8 15 post baseline ( i.e. , 3 , 7 , 14 day product use ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Trial Test Effect Marketed Mouth Rinse Stain Removal
DOC.detailed_description: Approximately 225 generally healthy subject meet required inclusion/exclusion criterion enrol 2 week , examiner-blind , single center , randomize , control , parallel-group clinical trial ensure approximately 215 subject complete study . At baseline , prescreened subject present clinical site baseline examination ( oral tissue assessment , extrinsic tooth stain assessment ) . Subjects brush water , floss , oral exam tooth stain assessment . Subjects randomly assign one three group use randomized code provide sponsor : - Negative Control - Brushing twice daily ADA - Accepted fluoride-containing dentifrice ( Colgate® Cavity Protection ) . - Brushing twice daily ADA - Accepted fluoride-containing dentifrice ( Colgate® Cavity Protection ) follow rinse twice daily 10 ml 60 second investigative peroxide fluoride contain mouth rinse - Brushing twice daily ADA - Accepted fluoride-containing dentifrice ( Colgate® Cavity Protection ) follow rinse twice daily 15 ml 60 second Crest® 3D White Multi-Care Whitening Rinse , Glamorous White , Fresh Mint Immediately randomization , subject begin use assigned test treatment . The site staff supervise first rinse treatment , rinse treatment occur examination day . The negative control group supervise brush clinic avoid possibility change usual brushing habit . All home use unsupervised follow label instruction . Subjects require maintain diary card document twice-daily product use record assigned oral care routine . For Clinic Visit 3 , 4 , 5 , subject instruct use treatment rinse morning prior clinic visit , treatment rinse supervise clinic visit . Subjects may brush normal morning prior clinic visit . During study , subject follow usual interdental cleaning ( e.g . floss ) dietary habit . Subjects allow use unassigned oral care product ( mouth rinse , dentifrice , tooth whiten product ) , teeth professionally polish , bleach , whiten dentist hygienist . Examinations oral hard/soft tissue assessment extrinsic tooth stain subject brush water floss repeat Clinic Visits 3 , 4 , 5 , Days 4 , 8 15 post baseline ( i.e. , 3 , 7 , 14 day product use ) . Compliance evaluate Visits 3 , 4 , 5 weigh residual volume return mouth rinse review subject diary . Subjects receive ADA-Accepted fluoride contain dentifrice soft bristle toothbrush baseline visit . During course study , subject may use interdental cleaning device remove impact food teeth may continue use interdental cleaning device regularly part usual oral care regimen .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 18 65 year . 2 . Able comprehend follow requirement study ( include availability schedule visit date ) base upon research site personnel 's assessment ; 3 . Able provide write informed consent ; 4 . Male nonpregnant , nonlactating female ( selfreported ) 5 . Male female subject reproductive potential must agree practice medically acceptable form birth control study 30 day follow last dose investigational product 6 . Medically acceptable form birth control may use subject and/or his/her partner 7 . Able read understand local language ; 8 . Able follow study procedure ; 9 . Willing investigational product use time period ; 10 . Willing able comply study procedure attend schedule visit duration study . 11 . Subject must least 2 natural anterior teeth , mean Lobene composite score ≥ 1.5 facial surface assess Investigator 1 . Suspected alcohol substance abuse ( e.g. , amphetamine , benzodiazepine , cocaine , marijuana ) opiates . 2 . Females pregnant breastfeeding . 3 . Males pregnant partner partner currently try become pregnant . 4 . Known sensitivity history significant adverse effect investigational product . 5 . Significant unstable uncontrolled medical condition may interfere subject 's participation study . 6 . Participated tooth stain removal trial least 3 month 7 . Participation clinical study within 30 day Visit 1 . 8 . Subjects related person involve directly indirectly conduct study ( i.e. , principal investigator , subinvestigators , study coordinator , site personnel , employee Johnson & Johnson subsidiary , contractor Johnson & Johnson , family ) . 9 . Other severe acute chronic medical psychiatric condition laboratory abnormality may increase risk associate study participation investigational product administration may interfere interpretation study result , judgment investigator , would make subject inappropriate entry study .
